title: Join CVU (Bronze/Silver teams)
body:
We currently have about two teams and would like to make more just leave your pref role and ign
Our teams currently are 
CVU Elite
Top- Sax
Jg- Nukalavi
Mid- Zadoo1
Adc- Untouchable6
Supp- Neednerfplz
sub- Papajordo

CVU Ignis
Top- Void Puppy
Jg- OG Slayer gang
Mid- Knuuckles
Adc- Aus Dave
Supp- Awsumlad
sub- The sethoridian

CVU Terra
Top- Sirjazza
Jg- Nyancat01
Mid-Freakyninja11
Adc- Ninjapanda
Supp- Twisted Kiwi

Hope i can join a team :)

support main but can learn other roles, silver 3 atm but hoping to climb in the preseason.
chat to me in client, wanna know more about how your teams interact :)
have 3 accounts. 1 in gold 5, 1 in gold 4 and one in plat 5. main support but i can fill. add me ~~~~Stealth Middas~~~~~
